synopsis: Three aliens come to a cardboard Earth to invade.

title.jp: From the Other Side of the Tears

synopsis: A sad young girl recovers from a heartache.
A groups of native warriors attack a giant kami in the shape of a bear. The kami sets one of the warriors on fire spiritually.
An avaricious record-store owner watches greedily as patrons look through his records.

title.jp: Alien Invasion from Space. Hiroshi`s Case

synopsis: Hiroshi tries to read his manga but a small robot is shooting pellets to distract him so the robot can escape.
A fish turns into a mermaid who swims out into a post-apocalyptic city.
An animator spends the whole day animating a 1-second clip of a giant fish in a city.
A young gyrosopter pilot visits a pool of water and remembers a gyrosopter battle and the death of a friend on a watery planet.

title.jp: Sport Captain Episode No.18: Assassin Descended from the Mountain Hunt!!

synopsis: A super hero comic book character and Tomoo's idol from Tobira Oda's manga, Danchi Tomoo. Who has his meal stolen by a cat after being attacked by a villain (his master's daughter). Then he imagine about his master (Paul) scaring the cats. Then he falls into a river, and chased by his sidekick (The Bear and The Crow) and drifts over a waterfall.
A young boy and his dog initiate a complex Rube Goldberg machine in order to steal a kiss from a young girl.
The family cat (Chobi) has had his tail stepped on one too many times and dreams of revenge.
A magical girl and her doll must defeat an invading horde of air pirates.
A group of children run across fields and play with a giant scary robot.
As an alien force hurtles toward NHK headquarters in Tokyo, the NHK building springs to life as an evangelion-transformer to battle the foe.
A young girl gets up from bed and sleepily tries to awaken herself.
